about_the_game:
Experience the ultimate drifting thrill in this action-packed racing game! Conquer challenging tracks, from winding mountain roads to vibrant racing circuits, and perfect your driving skills. Choose from a wide variety of customizable cars, each with unique handling, and drift your way to the top of the public leaderboards.

Whether you're racing solo or competing AI rivals, the gripping blend of speed, style, and precision will keep you hooked. Show the world what it takes to be a drift master!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX650 or AMD equivalent
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 20 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX1080 or AMD equivalent
